entry.title: 61 Inch Decorative Floor Lamp, Brushed Nickel & Straight Rectangular Pure White Linen Shade, With 1 PC ON-OFF Switch
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: Floor Lamp
Price: 266.84

Enhance a room's intimacy by providing illumination to specific seating or task areas and making them more functional. It can strongly affect the mood and the overall style of the room or space. To complement your room add elegant white floor lamps. This modern standing lamp comes with a sturdy metal frame along with a brushed nickel finish. The rectangular pure white linen shade of this light merges with any space design and offers sheer grace to any modern indoor space. Enjoy the diffused soft ambient lighting by installing this fixture in any living room, office, or bedroom. The LED Floor Lamp Fixture is UL listed, ensuring that this product is safe and hazard-proof and is suitable for use in dry indoor locations.  It has one bulb holder compatible with A19 style bulbs that come with an E26 base. A rocker switch on the base of the shade will allow you to turn it on or off. You can fix LED bulbs in the holder as using an LED light bulb accounts for extra savings and lets you set the desired ambiance in your interior décor.
